product_meta.title: Trish McEvoy Eye Base Essentials, shade=Bare
product_meta.description:
Trish McEvoy’s Eye Base Essentials is a shadow primer and upper-eye brightener designed to correct darkness and discoloration of the eyelid, instantly creating a more vibrant, bright-eyed look while locking shadow in place for crease-proof, all-day wear.

- Wear alone or as a primer for shadow longevity.
- Gluten free.
- Not tested on animals.

Directions:

Apply a generous amount of Eye Base Essentials to the ball of the eye. Using a Trish Laydown Brush blend upward and outward to cover the entire eyelid, including the inner corner of the eye, for maximum brightness.

Trish Tip:

Get as close to the lash line as possible without touching lashes.
